8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrated:"The Prophet would perform I'tikaf during the last ten (nights) of Ramadan. One year he did not perform I'tikaf, so he performed I'tikaf for twenty (nights) in the following year

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِعْتِكَافِ إِذَا خَرَجَ مِنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About When One Leaves From I'tikaf
